purposeDescriptions.low: slightly improves metabolic efficiency for a day, reducing hunger and improving stamina
purposeDescriptions.mid: improves oxygen uptake and metabolic efficiency, giving a burst of energy and an improvement to holding breath
purposeDescriptions.high: greatly improves oxygen uptake, allowing for underwater breathing and greatly improved above-water athletics
purposeDescriptions.invLow: reduces metabolic efficiency for a day, increasing hunger and reducing stamina
purposeDescriptions.invMid: interferes with target's lungs, causing them to gasp and wheeze uncontrollably
